reviews.review_msg: He gives u a CFA level 3 book (1000 pages) and you have to know it all otherwise you wont get more than B+. You need to know CFA level 1 & 2 to really take any advantage of the book. Derek just scold at u, if u ask questions. His finance knowledge if it is not less than students definitely is not more. He is Bad, really BAD! Like can drive nothing

Lectures boring like a hell and very long. He cannot do anything outside his notes. He cannot provide any justification or reason for his notes. Many unverified and bizarre statements. His finance knowledge is extremely low. His mathematics is even worse. Why is he teaching in ac graduate level? that's my question from Academic Chair of the program

He is the most horrible teacher I have ever had. Poor education style, poor knowledge, and generally avoid him at all costs. He has no finance background or education and he teaches finance. He is not logical and it is hard to argue with him.
